lead_paragraph: When Mark Zuckerberg, of Facebook, posted a photo of his run Friday, he set off reactions that ranged from mocking to genuine concern about his health.

byline.contributor: Austin Ramzy contributed reporting from Hong Kong. Cao Li contributed research from Beijing.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Chief Takes ‘Smog Jog’ in Beijing, and Reactions Run the Gamut
headline.main: With ‘Smog Jog’ Through Beijing, Zuckerberg Stirs Debate on Air Pollution

snippet: When Mark Zuckerberg, of Facebook, posted a photo of his run Friday, he set off reactions that ranged from mocking to genuine concern about his health.
abstract: Facebook co-founder and chief executive Mark Zuckerberg jogs through center of Beijing during trip to China, ignoring hazardous air quality there; run prompts debate over city's air pollution problems, as well as concerned and mocking responses on social networking site.
